meanings.definition: The state or quality of being sissified.
meanings.sent1: Her sissynesses was evident in the way she avoided any physical activities.
meanings.sent2: His sissynesses was clear when he refused to confront the bully.
meanings.sent3: Despite his sissynesses, he managed to charm everyone with his wit.
meanings.sent4: The sissynesses of the situation made him feel vulnerable and exposed.
meanings.sent5: The sissynesses of the kitten made it endearing to everyone.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being timid or cowardly.
meanings.sent1: The sissynesses in his voice was noticeable as he hesitated to speak up.
meanings.sent2: She overcame her sissynesses and stood up for herself.
meanings.sent3: His sissynesses was comical when he jumped at the sight of a harmless spider.
meanings.sent4: The sissynesses of the rabbit in the face of danger was surprising.
meanings.sent5: The sissynesses of the puppy melted everyone's hearts.

meanings.definition: The behavior or traits associated with being effeminate.
meanings.sent1: His sissynesses was evident in his delicate mannerisms.
meanings.sent2: The actor portrayed the sissynesses of the character with grace.
meanings.sent3: Her sissynesses added a touch of elegance to her personality.
meanings.sent4: The sissynesses of the flower petals reminded her of delicate lace.
meanings.sent5: The sissynesses of the painting captured the artist's attention to detail.
